title: Prayers to the Holy Spirit
text: O Holy Spirit, Soul of my soul, I adore Thee! Enlighten me, guide me, strengthen me, console me. Tell me what I ought to do. Give me Thy commands. I promise to submit myself to whatever Thou dost ask of me and to accept and to accept whatever Thou dost permit to happen to me. Grant only that I may know Thy Holy Will. Amen.
